name: Globe Consumer Discount Company v. City Wide Paint Stores, Inc., Appellant
name_abbreviation: Globe Consumer Discount Co. v. City Wide Paint Stores, Inc.

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Mtjsmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
Mr. Justice Musmanno joins in this dissenting opinion.
parties: Globe Consumer Discount Company v. City Wide Paint Stores, Inc., Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The Court being evenly divided, the order of the court below is affirmed.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

opinions.text:
Dissenting Opinion by
Mr. Justice Roberts:
I dissent for the reasons detailed in my dissenting opinion in All Purpose Finance Corp. v. D’Andrea, 427 Pa. 341, 235 A. 2d 808 (1967).
Mr. Justice Musmanno joins in this dissenting opinion.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Roberts:

casebody.head_matter:
Globe Consumer Discount Company v. City Wide Paint Stores, Inc., Appellant.
Argued December 1, 1966.
Before Bell, C. J., Mtjsmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused January 17, 1968.
Abe Lapowslcy, for appellants.
Philip Bhuchman, for appellee.
November 28, 1967:
